name: A Spat in the Strat
description:
A Spat in the Strat

Sun and Moon finally settle the score in a fast and loose gravity battle.

Made in 48 Hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

How to Play
  • Shoot projectiles to damage your opponent.
  • Projectiles have a gravitational pull towards Earth, Moon, and Sun
  • Use Gravity Flares to apply extra force to nearby projectiles.
  • If Earth explodes, everybody loses (there's no more orbit to pull everything together!)
  • A smarmy alien will send bombs towards Earth; join together to stop them or you'll both lose!
  • First one to not explode wins.
  • Play single or two player.
Controls Player 1 (& Single Player)
  • Move: A / D
  • Shoot: W
  • Gravity Flare: S (there's a typo in the game's control screen)
Player 2
  • Move: Left / Right
  • Shoot: Up
  • Gravity Flare: Down
Credits & Thanks

Damon Bolesta: Programming, Music, Art, Design

Mark Brown for creating Game Maker's Toolkit and hosting these jams

You, for playing!
